name: Residencial Lar do Areeiro

reviews.title: A Nasty Pension in Lisbon
reviews.text: Avoid this place like the plague! (Which you might catch if you stay here.) You can find much better hotels in Lisbon for a comparable price. They lost our reservation, then tried to put the two of us in a single room. The room they showed us was filthy! Trash and dirty laundry all over the place, facilities totally unkempt. When we refused to take that room, they attempted to give us a room in a decrepit apartment house across the street. We said "no thanks" amd walked around the corner to the Hotel Roma instead-- which was lovely. Stay away from the Pensao Lar Do Arreiro.

aka: Residencial Lar Do Areeiro Hotel Lisbon
